doc:
Patricia Heaton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patricia_Heaton 0 Patricia Helen Heaton (born March 4, 1958) is an American actress. She is best known for her starring role as Debra Barone in the CBS sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond (1996–2005) and as Frances "Frankie" Heck on the ABC sitcom The Middle (2009–2018). Heaton is a three-time Emmy Award winner – twice winning the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series for Everybody Loves Raymond, and a Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Culinary Program as host of Patricia Heaton Parties (2015–16). Patricia_Helen_Heaton ( born March_4_,_1958 ) is an_American_actress . She is_best_known for her_starring_role as Debra_Barone in the_CBS_sitcom_Everybody Loves Raymond_(_1996 – 2005_) and as Frances_"_Frankie_"_Heck on the_ABC_sitcom The_Middle_(_2009 – 2018_) . Heaton is a_three-time_Emmy_Award_winner – twice winning the_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Lead_Actress in a_Comedy_Series for Everybody Loves Raymond , and a_Daytime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Culinary_Program as host of Patricia_Heaton_Parties_(_2015 – 16_) .
